commands.title: Tether marks: Add file to harpoon
Tether marks: Go to harpoon mark

tetherMarks.registerList.description: Key symbols to be used as registers. Only include symbols that you can input with a single keystroke.

tetherMarks.registerSortByList.description: Sort marks by the order of the key symbols in the register list. If disabled, marks will be sorted alphabetically according to the current locale.

tetherMarks.harpoonRegisterList.description: Key symbols to be used as Harpoon registers. Only include symbols that you can input with a single keystroke.

tetherMarks.harpoonRegisterSortByList.description: Sort Harpoon marks by the order of the key symbols in the Harpoon register list. If disabled, marks will be sorted alphabetically according to the current locale.

tetherMarks.harpoonRegisterGapRemoval.description: Harpoon marks will be shifted to the left for every gap (register with no mark) based on the order of the Harpoon register list.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
